name: Venkata Srikanth

about: I have a strong background in mechanical engineering and business analysis, along with leadership and project management skills. I'm experienced in PowerBI, SQL, PowerPoint, and Excel. I excel in designing and improving mechanical systems, analyzing problems, and implementing solutions. I've worked closely with teams, gathering requirements, and developing strategic plans. I've successfully managed projects within budget and timelines, ensuring they align with organizational goals. I'm skilled in data analysis with SQL, creating clear presentations with PowerPoint, and using Excel for decision-making. Overall, I offer a diverse skill set and a proven track record of delivering results and fostering collaboration.

experience.title: Production Engineer
experience.description: As a data analyst, I have a strong background in implementing data governance and quality assurance measures to ensure the reliability and integrity of analytical datasets. I excel in creating interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI, providing valuable insights into key performance indicators and operational metrics, particularly in the crusher manufacturing industry.Through my proficiency in SQL and Python, I conduct data mining and exploratory analysis on large manufacturing datasets, uncovering patterns, trends, and anomalies to support data-driven decision-making. Additionally, I have experience in automating data extraction, transformation, and loading processes using Python and SQL scripts, streamlining data workflows and enhancing overall efficiency.My analytical skills, coupled with my expertise in data visualization and automation, allow me to deliver actionable insights and drive meaningful impact within manufacturing organizations.

education.title: Northwest Missouri State University
education.description: As a motivated and dedicated graduate student pursuing a Master's degree in Information Systems, I am actively seeking opportunities to apply my knowledge and skills in analyzing, designing, and managing information systems. With a solid foundation in database management, software development, and business intelligence, I am eager to contribute to organizations looking to optimize their information technology infrastructure and leverage data-driven insights for strategic decision-making.
